questionsAndAnswers.front: What is an Instruction Set Architecture (ISA)?
questionsAndAnswers.back: The interface between hardware and software, defining instructions a processor can execute

questionsAndAnswers.front: List three components that determine CPU time according to the performance equation.
questionsAndAnswers.back: Instruction Count, CPI (Cycles Per Instruction), Clock Cycle Time (or Clock Rate)

questionsAndAnswers.front: What does CPI stand for and what can influence this?
questionsAndAnswers.back: Cycles Per Instruction. Influenced by ISA, Compiler, CPU architecture and caching
